# 1. Importing KEGG pathways with KEGGscape
```{r}
```


```{r}
library(RCy3)
```
- Installing KEGGscape App

```{r}
installApp('KEGGscape')
```

- Importing a kinase pathway

```{r}
library(httr)
GET("http://localhost:1234/keggscape/v1/mmu04150")
```

- Importing a substrate pathway

```{r}
GET("http://localhost:1234/keggscape/v1/mmu03008")
```

- Checking pathway networks in Cytoscape

```{r}
networks = getNetworkList()
```
